I'm setting this page up for anyone who I've done some graphics work for, or if you really just like me and would like to donate to my "I want a powerbook to replace my old ibook" fund.
This is obviously optional, and I will continue to help others out to the best of my ability when I can.  But <em>a new Macbook would go a long way of helping out</em>.
<form action="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr" method="post">

Or, if you'd simply like to make a contribution to help keep this any one of my <a href="http://www.wpstation.com">other sites</a> online, you can donate to my hosting fund.<a href="https://www.asmallorange.com/extras/donate/?id=9400"><img src="http://www.miklb.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2006/05/aso.png" alt="ASO" /></a>
</form>
